triples.name: Neural network
triples.relevance: The paper uses radial basis function neural networks to approximate unknown nonlinear functions in the control system.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel adaptive event-triggered neural control protocol for systems with uncertain dynamics.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the control problem for nonlinear multiagent systems with leader-follower configuration.

triples.name: Radial basis function network
triples.relevance: RBF neural networks are specifically used to approximate unknown nonlinear functions in the control system.

triples.name: Lyapunov function
triples.relevance: The Lyapunov function method is employed for stability analysis of the proposed control system.
